IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: To provide shelter, counseling, and advocacy. The mission of Center for Family Services is to support and empower individuals, families, and communities to achieve a better life through vision, hope, and strength.
IRS990.MissionDescription: To provide shelter, counseling, and advocacy. The mission of Center for Family Services is to support and empower individuals, families, and communities to achieve a better life through vision, hope, and strength.
IRS990.Description: The organization provides psychotheraupeutic, supportive, information counseling, telephone hotline, youth shelter services, advocacy, and treatment services to individuals in several New Jersey counties.

OtherAssets.Description: Cash Value of Life Insurance Policy
Loan Fees, Net of Accumulated Amortization

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: Center for Family Services Inc adopted the new accounting for uncertainty in income taxes guidance on 7/1/2009 which prescribes a recognition threshold of more-likely-than-not to be sustained upon examination by the appropriate taxing authority. Management has determined that the adoption of this provision does not have a material impact on the financial statements.
Capitalized Grant Funded Equipment $198,073 Depreciation of Grant Funded Equipment (355,776) Net Assets Released from Restrictions (66,742) Net Assets Temporarily Restricted 60,000

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: Grant expenditure reports are submitted quarterly.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Board of Trustees reviews and approves Form 990 before it is filed.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Each board member must complete a Conflict on Interest policy Statement by July 1st of each year.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The compensation of the President & CEO and key employees is reviewed by the Personnel Committee of the Board of Trustees and is reviewed and approved by the Board of Trustees.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The Organization's documents are made available upon request.
